title: Senior Product Engineer
description: Led the development of the company's flagship product, a SaaS platform for marketing analytics. Collaborated with design and product teams to deliver features that increased user engagement by 45%.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Built and maintained microservices architecture for a fintech product. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated testing that reduced deployment time by 60%.

title: Frontend Engineer
description: Developed responsive web applications for clients across various industries. Mentored junior developers and established coding standards for the frontend team.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Assisted in developing features for an e-commerce platform. Participated in code reviews and improved site performance by optimizing database queries.
